Chapter Previous Next

class gstTriPolyMesh : public gstTriPolyMeshBase

Implements collection of triangular polygons that may or may not share vertices and edges.

From header file: gstTriPolyMesh.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstTriPolyMeshCreates an initially empty set of triangular polygons.
gstTriPolyMeshCopy Constructor.
gstTriPolyMeshConstructor.
gstTriPolyMeshConstructor.
gstTriPolyMeshConstructor.
~gstTriPolyMesh
Functions
cloneTriPolyMesh Virtual method to copy this gstTriPolyMesh object and return gstTriPolyMesh pointer to newly cloned object.
copyPolygon Create new gstTriPoly by copying poly's vertices first and then creating poly with copied vertices.
copyVertex Creates new gstVertex with same position as vertToCopy if a vertex at that position does not already exist.
createTriPoly Creates new gstTriPoly with vertices v1, v2, and v3 and gives the new polygon a key of polyKey.
createTriPoly Creates new gstTriPoly with vertices v1, v2, and v3 and gives the new polygon a key of polyKey.
createVertex Create new gstVertex to be used in gstTriPolys that follow.
findCoincidentVertex Returns pointer to gstVertex coincident with vert if one exists.
getDeleteStrandedVertices Returns TRUE if vertices that have no neighbor edges are to be deleted.
getNumPolygons Returns number of polygons defined for gstTriPolyMesh.
getNumVertices Returns number of vertices defined for gstTriPolyMesh.
getPolygon Returns pointer to gstTriPolygon that has key equal to polyKey if one exists.
getSpatialPartition Returns pointer to gstSpatialPartition defined for this object if one has been created.
getVertex Returns pointer to gstVertex that has key equal to vertKey if one exists.
initSpatialPartition Creates a new spatial partition for this object if one hasn't already been defined and initializes it to reflect the mesh defined by this gstTriPolyMesh.
polygonsBegin Returns an iterater pointing to the begining of the polygons defined for this gstTriPolyMesh.
polygonsEnd Returns an iterater pointing to the end of the polygons defined for this gstTriPolyMesh.
removePolygon Removes gstTriPoly defined for this mesh with key equal to polyKey and returns TRUE if one exists that meets this criteria.
removePolygon Removes gstTriPoly polyToRemove if it is contained by this mesh and returns TRUE.
removeVertex Removes gstVertex defined for this mesh with key equal to vertKey and returns TRUE if one exists that meets this criteria.
setDeleteStrandedVertices If deleteStrandedVertices is TRUE, vertices that have no neighbor edges are to be deleted.
setSpatialPartition Sets spatial partition defined for this object to s.
setUseSpatialPartition If u is TRUE the spatial partition defined for this mesh is used to speed up calculations if one exists.
useSpatialPartition Returns TRUE if the spatial partition defined for this mesh is used to speed up calculations if one has been created.
verticesBegin Returns begining iterator for vertices.
verticesEnd Returns ending iterator for vertices.
getClassTypeId Static: get type id of this class.
staticIsOfType Return TRUE if class is of the given type or is derived from that type.
Virtual Functions
beginModifySignifies that this object may be modified after this call.
cloneVirtual method to copy this object and return base class pointer to newly copied object.
endModifySignifies that modifications to the argument spatial object have ceased.
getBoundingBoxReturns gstBoundingBox just enclosing this triangle.
getBoundingSphereReturns gstBoundingSphere just enclosing this triangle.
getContainedObjectsReturned vector of pointers to gstSpatialObjects that are contained within this gstTriPolyMesh.
